events.message: I am filing a claim regarding the car accident I was involved in last night. The vehicle sustained significant damage in the collision.
The claim has been categorised under the Auto Accident cluster due to keywords indicating vehicle collision and accident details.
An agent has been assigned to your case to ensure that your car accident claim is handled swiftly and with care.
We have acknowledged your claim and appreciate you providing detailed information about the vehicle damage after the collision.
Please submit all necessary documents including police report, photos of the car damage, and repair estimates for your claim.
All requested documents have been submitted including the accident report and multiple images covering all vehicle damages.
Our claims investigation team has started reviewing the submitted evidence and contacting involved parties regarding the auto accident.
The investigation into the vehicle collision and accident circumstances has been completed with all facts verified.
We have prepared and proposed a fair settlement amount based on the damage assessment and repair costs for your car.
Thank you for your positive feedback on how we handled your auto accident claim and settlement proposal.
Your claim has been approved following confirmation of the damage and acceptance of the proposed settlement.
The payment for your approved auto accident claim has been issued and should arrive in your bank account shortly.
Your claim file has been officially closed as the payment has been made and all procedures for the accident completed.
